description:
Navy Admiral Ryokugyu keeps up a savage assault against the Akazaya samurai who are still recovering from the last battle. Momonosuke tries to defend the Land of Wano with all his might, but he gets driven into a corner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Ankunft der neuen Ära! – Der Zorn des Rothaar-Kaisers
Nouvelle ère en approche. L`ire de l`Empereur roux !
Shinjidai Tourai! Akagami no Koutei no Ikari
The Coming of the New Era! The Red-Haired`s Imperial Rage
اقتراب حقبة جديدة! غضب اليونكو أحمر الشّعر!
新時代到来! 赤髪の皇帝の怒り
